*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional attack
*For every attack performed*
- {passiveImg:forever}Ki +1 (up to +4)
- {passiveImg:forever}Chance of evading enemy's attack 4%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 40%)
*Per "Universe 6", "Joined Forces" or "Pure Saiyans"
Category ally on the team*
- ATK 6%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When there is a "Universe Survival Saga" or "Pure Saiyans"
Category enemy*
- Launches an additional Super Attack

causes supreme damage to enemy
